| HistoryText             = [[George Maxon (Earth-616)|George Maxon]] of the Maxon Aircraft Corporation comes in person to watch his new plane take an army test. The plane catches on fire while in the air and crashes, killing the men onboard. [[Steven Rogers (Earth-616)|Steve]] is aghast when Maxon shows more remorse for the plane's failure than the dead crew members.{{r|Captain America Comics Vol 1 1}}
